mapper.insert: insert into t_spot (s_id, s_cate, s_name, s_add, s_detail, s_pic, s_ref) values (seq_s_id.nextval, #{s_cate}, #{s_name}, #{s_add}, #{s_detail}, #{s_pic, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{s_ref})
mapper.update: update t_spot set s_name = #{s_name}, s_cate = #{s_cate}, s_add = #{s_add}, s_detail = #{s_detail}, s_pic = #{s_pic, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where s_id = #{s_id}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from t_spot where s_cate = #{s_cate}) a) where rnum >= #{dto.startRow} and rnum <= #{dto.endRow}
select * from t_spot order by s_id desc
select count(*) from t_spot where s_cate = #{s_cate}
